definitions.definition: A rearrangement of an older piece of music , possibly including various cosmetic changes.
A piece of music formed by combining existing pieces of music together, possibly including various other cosmetic changes

main_definition: ( music ) A rearrangement of an older piece of music , possibly including various cosmetic changes.
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A piece of music formed by combining existing pieces of music together, possibly including various other cosmetic changes
